metadata.name: Remote Task Creation via ATSVC Named Pipe - Zeek
metadata.comment: Detects remote task creation via at.exe or API interacting with ATSVC namedpipe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(file.path) regexp '\\.*\\ipc$' AND lower(file.name) = lower('atsvc'))

output.summary: Detects remote task creation via at.exe or API interacting with ATSVC namedpipe
